tool.name: Workflow-2 Parameters Maystro
tool.description: Store parameters of workflow-2 to be used again
tool.command: #if $user_json and str($user_json) != 'None': cp '$user_json' '$output_json' #else python3 -c "import json; params = { 'DnaOptimizationProblemClass': '$DnaOptimizationProblemClass', 'methylation_protection': '$methylation_protection', 'allow_edits': '$allow_edits', 'avoid_patterns': '$avoid_patterns', 'hairpin_constraints': '$hairpin_constraints', 'gc_constraints': '$gc_constraints', 'kmer_size': '$kmer_size', 'assembly_plan_name': '$assembly_plan_name', 'topology': '$topology', 'enzyme': '$enzyme', 'execution': '$execution', 'db_uri': '$db_uri', 'table': '$table_name', 'fragment_column': '$fragment_column', 'sequence_column': '$sequence_column', 'annotation_column': '$annotation_column' }; f = open('$output_json', 'w'); json.dump(params, f, indent=4); f.close()" && echo DEBG && cat '$output_json' #end if && echo DEBG && cat '$output_json'

param.name: hairpin_constraints
param.label: Hairpins Constraints
param.help: e.g. (you can add others Hairpins Constraints on a new line): stem_size=20, hairpin_window=200

param.name: gc_constraints
param.label: Enforce GC Content Constraints
param.help: e.g. (you can add others Enforce GC Content Constraints on a new line): mini=0.3, maxi=0.7, window=100

param.name: allow_edits
param.label: Allow Sequence Edits
param.help: If False, sequences cannot be edited by the domesticator, only extended with flanks. If a sequence has for instance forbidden restriction sites, the domesticaton will fail for this sequence (and this will be noted in the report.

param.name: execution
param.label: Save To DB ?
param.help: If True data will be saved in the DB

param.name: db_uri
param.help: Only if Input Your Parameters As JSON is FALSE

param.name: user_json
param.help: Only if Input Your Parameters As JSON is TRUE

param.name: gc_constraints
param.value: mini=0.3, maxi=0.7, window=100 mini=0.1, maxi=0.9, window=100

tool.help:
Parameters Maystro for workflow-2 =================================
Store and Generate a JSON file to be used as workflow-2 configuration. This JSON file can later be used as input to pass workflow-2 parameters
